content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, y=6.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=0.5, y=6.5), boiler(position x=-5.0, y=2.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5)

### Iron plate mine at position(15.5, y=70.5)
Consists of Electric mining drill (position x=15.5, y=70.5), Electric mining drill (position x=18.5, y=70.5), Electric mining drill (position x=21.5, y=70.5), Furnace (position x=16.0, y=73.0), Furnace (position x=19.0, y=73.0), Furnace (position x=22.0, y=73.0), Inserter (position x=16.5, y=74.5), Inserter (position x=16.5, y=75.5), Inserter (position x=19.5, y=75.5), Belt group (positions x=18.5 y=75.5, x=23.5 y=74.5, x=18.5 y=77.5, x=40.5 y=74.5)

### Iron gear wheel factory at position(37.5, y=74.5)
Consists of Assembling machine (position x=37.5, y=74.5), Assembling machine (position x=41.5, y=78.5), Assembling machine (position x=36.5, y=79.5), Inserter (position x=39.5, y=74.5), Inserter (position x=43.5, y=78.5), Inserter (position x=38.5, y=79.5), Belt group (positions x=38.5 y=72.5, x=39.5 y=72.5, x=39.5 y=73.5, x=18.5 y=74.5, x=20.5 y=74.5, x=20.5 y=75.5)

## ERROR TIPS
- Avoid using undefined names. (Step 113)
- Ensure entities exist at the specified position before attempting to access or manipulate them. (Steps 115, 117, 118, 119)
  - Specifically, check if a small-electric-pole exists at a position before trying to access it.

## NAMESPACE
- `get_entity(Prototype, position)`: Retrieves an entity of a specific prototype at a given position.
  - Failure mode: Raises an exception if no entity of the specified type is found at the position. (Steps 115, 117, 118, 119)
  - Success mode: Returns the entity if found.
- Important variables:
  - `pole.position`: Position of a small-electric-pole entity. (Type: Position)
  - `Prototype.SmallElectricPole`: Prototype of a small-electric-pole entity. (Type: Prototype)
